Nov. 28, 1942 D South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (B Section)
South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (B Section) 20 Test Piece Contest South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association south-wales-monmouthshire-brass-band-association-b
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Town Hall, Pontypridd 38th annual contest 3 bands competed.
March 2, 2013, 10:24 a.m. Jan. 30, 2019, 3:27 p.m.
1 Blaengarw W. Jenkins Halevy [arr. Round]
2 Pontycymer Frank Badminton Il Trovatore [arr. Hawkins]
3 Pontypridd St.John's Ambulance W. J. Davies Don Giovanni [arr. Hawkins]
